Inventory_Items.Name: Sauce Labs Backpack
Inventory_Items.Description: carry.allTheThings() with the sleek, streamlined Sly Pack that melds uncompromising style with unequaled laptop and tablet protection.

Inventory_Items.Name: Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt
Inventory_Items.Description: Get your testing superhero on with the Sauce Labs bolt T-shirt. From American Apparel, 100% ringspun combed cotton, heather gray with red bolt.

Inventory_Items.Name: Sauce Labs Onesie
Inventory_Items.Description: Rib snap infant onesie for the junior automation engineer in development. Reinforced 3-snap bottom closure, two-needle hemmed sleeved and bottom won't unravel.

Inventory_Items.Name: Sauce Labs Bike Light
Inventory_Items.Description: A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding your bike at night. Water-resistant with 3 lighting modes, 1 AAA battery included.

Inventory_Items.Name: Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket
Inventory_Items.Description: It's not every day that you come across a midweight quarter-zip fleece jacket capable of handling everything from a relaxing day outdoors to a busy day at the office.

Inventory_Items.Name: Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)
Inventory_Items.Description: This classic Sauce Labs t-shirt is perfect to wear when cozying up to your keyboard to automate a few tests. Super-soft and comfy ringspun combed cotton.
